package.name: lego_mcp_pinn_twin
package.description:
Physics-Informed Neural Network Digital Twin for LEGO MCP Manufacturing System.
Implements ISO 23247 compliant digital twin with: - Physics-constrained neural networks (conservation laws) - Real-time state estimation with uncertainty quantification - Predictive maintenance via degradation modeling - Causal discovery for root cause analysis - Anomaly detection via physics violation
Target Standards: - ISO 23247 Digital Twin Framework - IEC 62264 Manufacturing Operations - ASME Y14.46 Digital Product Definition
package.author: LEGO MCP Digital Twin Team
